statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT username, city, country FROM users WHERE country = 'USA' AND age >= 18;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' OR city = 'San Francisco';
SELECT user_id, username, email, age, city, country, join_date FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY join_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE country IN ('USA', 'Canada', 'UK') AND city IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT user_id, country, join_date FROM users WHERE age >= 18 AND age <= 25 ORDER BY country, join_date ASC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, email, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC, user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 40 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age, gender FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT u.username, c.connection_date FROM users u JOIN connections c ON u.user_id = c.user1_id ORDER BY c.connection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, description FROM user_profiles WHERE num_of_friends > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, description FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM connections ORDER BY connection_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, description, num_of_friends FROM user_profiles WHERE num_of_friends > 100;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE LENGTH(username) > 10 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, description FROM user_profiles WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.username, c.connection_type FROM user_profiles u JOIN connections c ON u.user_id = c.user_id1;
SELECT u.username, a.activity_description, a.activity_date FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id ORDER BY a.activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE location='New York' AND dob>'1990-01-01'
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, friend_id, status FROM friends WHERE status='accepted'
SELECT * FROM comments ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, count(*) as friends_count FROM friends GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT p.post_id, u.username, p.post_content, c.comment_content FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, c.comment_content FROM users u JOIN comments c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT username, email, bio FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 4, 5);
SELECT * FROM Connections WHERE user_id = 2 AND connection_user_id = 4;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM Messages ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, bio FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Connections WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY connection_id ASC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
